title: Karura Mau! Kokoku Gen'eijou
alternative_title: The Illusory Castle in the Lake Nation ; Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau! Kokoku Gen'eijou
status: The Illusory Castle in the Lake Nation ; Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau! Kokoku Gen'eijou
description:
Description :
        Shirotae will return. With that belief, Shouko does her best to understand the young man's multiple personality disorder. What are Shirotae's origins? How come his entire family are magic users? And how does one go to this alternate dimension, the Lake Nation?

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: A House In The Underworld
